programme.title: Wildest India: India's Lost World
programme.desc: North-east India is an anthropological paradise; there is no other place on Earth with so many different ethnic groups. The forest are filled with mysterious tribes whose lives are dictated by the rain and the seasonal fruits of the forest.

programme.title: Wildest India: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains
programme.desc: See how the Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India.The Himalayas' highlands offer little direct refuge to humans. /Then, learn about the western Ghats. A spine of mountains that lay claim to being one of the most bio-diverse places in the world.

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands
programme.desc: Covering 200,000 km sq, India's Thar desert is one of the harshest places on Earth. Desiccating winds and near permanent drought has earned this unforgiving land another name: the region of death.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life
programme.desc: Then watch, the longest river in India, The Ganges. It's a lifeline to wild animals, from rhinoceros and river dolphins to otters and gharials.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Operation Valkyrie

programme.title: We Were Soldiers

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: No one doubts a woman’s capacity to love, but sometimes lust can turn lethal. In the ultimate fatal attraction, "Deadly Women" looks at cases of murder driven by obsessive love.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: In some cases, the transformation from everyday woman to brutal killer is activated by a man. A boyfriend or husband can become the focus of a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The heaviest judgments of convicted killers are reserved for those who committed premeditated murder. These women plot and plan. They know the consequences of their actions, but still they go forward to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Love can be beautiful, love can be blind and love can be deadly. Desire and jealousy are powerful forces driving women to dark and horrifying places in their minds.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Killer Kids
programme.desc: For many parents, their children's teen years can be one big headache. But when typical teenage rebellion turns into deadly rage, a parent's love may not be enough to save their life.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Senseless Slayings
programme.desc: When a person places no value on human life, they can become unstoppable in their twisted missions to destroy the lives around them. These women all pushed boundaries, and shattered lives with their actions.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hunter's Game
programme.desc: In the 1970's and 80s, people went to Alaska looking for a fresh start, to reinvent themselves, or to disappear for a while. Some of those disappearances weren't by choice.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Master Plan
programme.desc: Willow Springs, Illinois, seemed like any other quiet Midwestern community. But it was really one of the most corrupt places in the nation. This tiny village, nestled just outside of Chicago, was in the hip pocket of organized crime.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, a serial killer stalked lone victims in the dead of night, his hunting ground the suburbs of Washington, D.C., his target, anyone who owned a car.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Moving Target

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fateful Twist
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Predators And Parasites
programme.desc: For the forensic entomologist, the insects that nest in dead bodies are like tiny witnesses to a crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Drawing Conclusions

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team that prepares the most-impressive Southern-inspired menu for a sorority's anniversary party wins a trip to Las Vegas; both teams struggle with communication during dinner service.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: CLAIRE and TESS save a neighbour from a burning shed, but all is not as it seems. His desperate act prompts CLAIRE to work harder than ever to keep Drovers Run and Tess reveals why she’s frightened of true love.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Theft is on everyone’s mind and the women on Drover’s Run have their own style of justice.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: When CLAIRE attends a seminar she leaves TESS in charge of Drovers Run and on her return she discovers a lot more can happen in twenty four hours than she would ever have imagined or, at least, would have led TESS to believe.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Pushed by a neighbour’s untimely death Harry works too hard and is found trapped under a tractor. Fearing the end Harry continues to play one son off against the other and Tess learns a shocking secret from Liz.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Weather or Not
programme.desc: Peter battles the elements to build a retirement home for childhood sweethearts, while Bryan Jr. constructs an entryway for his own sweetheart - wife Tabby.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Beat creates a cozy cabin in Germany, while Peter and Sr. win a Guinness World Record with their jaw-dropping one-of-a-kind log car, and Joel takes on a difficult build made even tougher with a rookie slinging logs.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Heaven’s Gate
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. feels the heat to recreate the cozy log home a British Columbia couple lost to a fire. Meanwhile, Peter hopes for a ticket to heaven by building a covered entrway for the local church.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Under the Gun
programme.desc: While Beat constructs a luxury fishing lodge in northern British Columbia, Bryan Jr. is covered into giving the local gun shop a much-needed facelift.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Stranded
programme.desc: The U.S Border Patrol received some solid intel about smugglers heading from Dominican Republic to Puerto Rico

programme.title: Drug Wars: The New Drug Stores
programme.desc: Guatemalan drug gangs are taking over small businesses, using local hotels and restaurants as fronts for selling drugs. Law enforcement attempts a crackdown, with hundreds of police officers executing big raids on these small-time dealers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Dark Daze in Guatemala
programme.desc: In one of Guatemala City’s most violent neighborhoods a witch summons her spirits. This witch was a former gang member, a Mara Salvatrucha, one of the most feared criminal organizations in the world.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Carry a Big Stick
programme.desc: In The Philippines, a controversial new frontier in the war on drugs develops as the country’s president declares open season on anyone caught dealing drugs. In Manila, the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency embarks on a multi-target drug raid.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacoby’s mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Intoxicated Marina Idiots
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia are on a hunt for a 2007 Porsche & a 2008 Audi from the same drug dealing debtor. Next, Matt and Froy pry a truck from a group of intoxicated idiots at a marina. And finally, Matt and Lou hit up an upscale Glendale neighborhood to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: It's Not Funny
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a comedian's preparations for a show to repossess his Dodge, but not if his girlfriend has anything to say about it. Then, Lyndah & Sonia respond to a tip and sabotage a paparazzo's big shot by hooking his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Get That Prowler
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client? Then, Matt and Froy attempt to repo a DeLorean.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the docks.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Staycation Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to give his family the best vacation ever but things do not go well at all.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Thief Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey steals sixty dollars from Gigi's wallet and turns back around and blames Kevin for it.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Bad Dream Episode
programme.desc: Kevin and Nick goes to an R-rated movie, but Kevin has nightmares from seeing it.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The 22 Episode
programme.desc: The family oversleeps on the day Lindsey is scheduled to sing the national anthem at a baseball game. Meanwhile, Kevin gets sick.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem

programme.desc: A psychic (Tamlyn Tomita) assisting police with a serial killer investigation "sees'' that a television reporter is really Sam (Scott Bakula), whose task is to save her from being another victim. With Dean Stockwell.

programme.desc: First-time parents Nicola Moore and Tony Curry are desperate to find their first home where they can bring up 1-year-old son Lucas.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Sutton Coldfield
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil are kicking-off the series with one hell of a challenge, they're in Birmingham, house hunting for three generations of one family… one big house, for one big, extended family.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Hackney
programme.desc: This week we're guiding two first time buyers through the property jungle that is East London. Rosie Evatt and Laura Coveney have been friends since childhood and are pooling their resources to buy their first property together.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Revisit 1: Sutton Coldfield/Norwich
programme.desc: In this episode, Kirstie and Phil are catching up with two couples who gave them two tough challenges in two fast moving property markets – Sutton Coldfield in Birmingham and Norwich.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Siblings
programme.desc: Alexis gives her newfound long-lost son Adam a job at Colbyco. Blake starts to believe that Adam may actually be his real son. Fallon and Adam keep flirting with each other, not knowing they are siblings. Adam has dinner with Krystle and Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty: Mark
programme.desc: Blake tries to be friends with Adam, but Adam rejects him. Alexis tells Mark that he's still married to Krystle. Mark seeks to get a job as a tennis pro at Fallon's hotel.

programme.title: Dynasty: Kirby
programme.desc: Joseph's daughter, Kirby comes to stay with the Carringtons after breaking up with her fiance in France. Joseph tries to persuade her to go back to him. Mark gets the job at Fallon's hotel. Blake tries to get help from congressman Neal McVane.

programme.title: Dynasty: La Mirage
programme.desc: Fallon gets a letter from Steven and it turns out he's on an oil rig in the Java Sea, Indonesia. Adam mixes the toxic compound in the paint for Jeff's new office. Fallon hires Kirby as a nanny for little Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty: Acapulco
programme.desc: Jeff starts to become dizzy and affected by the toxic paint Adam used in his office. Joseph tells Kirby to stay away from Jeff. Krystle goes to Acapulco to find out what really happened with so-called divorce from Mark.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Locket
programme.desc: The Carrington family is informed that Steven's oil rig exploded. Blake goes to look for him, with an uninvited Alexis. Sammy Jo's father returns to Denver to collect Sammy Jo's share of Steven's inheritance, but Krystle throws him out.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.245
programme.desc: A woman hits a parked Jaguar while parallel parking, facing a lawsuit from her father for unpaid parking tickets and car damage. Another woman sues her ex-fiancé for his share of a canceled wedding, a loan for a car, and unpaid credit card charges.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.199
programme.desc: A teen DD falls asleep at the wheel, totaling a car after giving drunk minors a ride. Co-workers moving in together face bed mix-ups, pet issues, and a broken lease.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support. /A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.

programme.desc: Woman sues ex-friend for damaging Pontiac Grand Prix she was selling; ex-friend countersues for car payments. Parents fight over sick child's medication; neighbor testifies helping administer meds.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.240

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.202
programme.desc: Lesbian ex-lovers accuse each other of paint-ball vandalism and car damage after a bitter break-up over alleged loans for clothes and a stereo.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.172
programme.desc: Man not father of child, sues mother for alleged loans. Jailed vegan seeks bailout due to prison food, friend demands repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.108
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-boyfriend of coercing money and housing with suicide threats/Teens dispute sale of stolen car in hit-and-run.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Glaciers
programme.desc: Clinging to the world’s highest mountains and forming ice caps on both poles, glaciers leave an impression on the landscape and on all who bear witness to their splendor.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: Arthur: Hide And Snake/Muffy's New Best Friend
programme.desc: The kids capture a snake and learn that it's possibly poisonous--after it gets lost in Arthur's house! Why is Muffy interviewing for a new best friend? She and Francine are usually inseparable, but lately it seems they have less in common.

programme.title: Arthur: Fernlets by Fern/Prunella and the Haunted Locker
programme.desc: Muffy talks Fern into writing poems for a new line of greeting cards which becomes the hit of Elwood City, but booming business causes Fern to burn out. Prunella is assigned a new school locker, which is rumored to be haunted!

programme.title: Arthur: Feeling Flush/Family Fortune
programme.desc: During a drought, Francine bets Arthur that her family can use less water than his. The TV show, Treasure Caravan, is coming to Elwood City! Arthur and D.W. are convinced they'll find treasures that will make them rich and famous.

programme.title: Arthur: He Said, He Said/Bunny Trouble
programme.desc: A special episode of Bionic Bunny is interrupted, and Arthur and friends try to remember what comes next. D.W. is excited to be taking care of the class bunny, Larry. But Larry is feeling adventurous and and wanders off.

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella the Packrat/What's in a Name?
programme.desc: Prunella saves everything. Can Arthur help her break her packrat habits in time to put together the display for the school's Earth Day fair? Binky find out that his real name isn't Binky--it's Shelley?!

programme.title: Arthur: Unfinished/D.W., Bossy Boots
programme.desc: Arthur is completely riveted by a book and can't wait to see how it ends. But the last few pages are missing! Now what? For D.W., there's nothing better than getting her own way--that is, until all her friends stop playing with her.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Name Game/Finders Key-Pers
programme.desc: D.W. and Arthur get their feelings hurt when their efforts to insult each other get out of control. Next, Arthur, Brain, and Binky find a key--but to what? And which of them will get to keep whatever fabulous thing they find with it?

programme.title: Arthur: Locked In The Library!/Arthur Accused!
programme.desc: Arthur and Francine are fighting. But when they get locked inside the library they either have to make up or prepare for a long evening. And when Buster opens his detective agency, he has no idea his first job will involve Arthur.

programme.title: Arthur: Blabbermouth/All Grown Up
programme.desc: Buster is hurt when he learns his friends don't trust him to keep a secret. Then, the gang finds a mysterious fortune telling game at the library and gets a hint of what their futures could hold.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Jews Who Fought for Hitler
programme.desc: In Hitler’s Germany, those with Jewish ancestry faced harsh Nuremberg Laws. Full Jews faced death; Mischlinge endured discrimination, job bans. Some, like Helmut Schmidt, unaware of heritage, found protectors like Milch in high places.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Grand Mufti
programme.desc: The controversy surrounding Mohammad Amin al-Husayni, stems from his Nazi collaboration. He recruited Bosnian Muslims and advocated for a Palestinian homeland with Nazi help. His diaries reveal awareness of the Holocaust and anti-Semitic sentiments.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The IRA Conspiracy
programme.desc: During WWII, the IRA's "S Plan" aimed to bomb Britain, drawing German support to weaken the British. "Operation Green" and "Plan Kathleen" envisioned IRA aiding a German invasion of Northern Ireland, but both failed due to bungling and infighting.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Arajs Kommando
programme.desc: Viktor Arajs, a Latvian, played a significant role in the Holocaust, collaborating with the Nazis to eliminate Jews. Leading the Arajs Kommando, he orchestrated the killings of around 30,000 Jews. Arajs justified his actions as patriotic defense.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: Vidkun Quisling
programme.desc: Vidkun Quisling, once honored for diplomacy, turned traitor by collaborating with Nazis. His bid for power in Norway failed, relegated by Germans. Despite being named "fuehrer," his reign led to repression until his hanging post-Nazi defeat.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Artis & Jess
programme.desc: Five months ago Artis met Jess online. Artis and Jess each were in relationships, but believed they'd found true love. But is Jess everything that she says she is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Craig & Zoe
programme.desc: Craig's sister introduced him to a beautiful girl named Zoe on Facebook. After talks online of a future life together, things turn sour. Now he wants to know who he gave his heart to.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Falesha & Jacqueline
programme.desc: Falesha's name and pictures were stolen by a fake profile that nearly ruined her life. She thought her troubles were behind her, but four years later her past comes back to haunt her.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Max discover that Dejay and Malik are being played by the same guy. Sparks fly as they discover just how explosive a love triangle can be. (S5, ep1)

programme.title: The City: Fashion With A Capital F
programme.desc: Olivia refuses to wear a designer's clothes to their own party, which angers some. Whitney shows Joe Zee her line &amp; gets some harsh criticism. Erin eyes a replacement for Olivia. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The British Are Coming
programme.desc: Olivia's flubs during Fashion Week leave an opening that Erin quickly tries to fill with a new fashion reporter. Roxy impresses Kelly by helping to produce a huge fashion show. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Work Horses And Show Ponies
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy fly to Miami to put on a fashion show for Whitney's clothing line, without Kelly's help! Olivia fights for her job by scoring an interview with Zac Posen. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: The City: One Girl's Trash...
programme.desc: After a successful showing of her line, Whitney's first big sale almost ends in disaster. Erin thinks Olivia is taking undue credit for pulling the perfect look for an ELLE shoot. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: The City: Stage Fight
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney have a falling out when Roxy dresses a new musician in Whitney's clothing. Erin gains a spot on the Martha Stewart Show &amp; needs Olivia's help to make it a success. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Roommate Wanted
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney continue to fight &amp; Roxy looks for her own place. Olivia reluctantly interviews a celebrity wearing Whitney's line &amp; Erin sees another opportunity to replace her. (S2, ep11)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Cabs Are Here!
programme.desc: Ronnie and Sammi's tumultuous relationship finally comes to an end, but when Ronnie destroys everything Sammi owns, she must decide whether or not to leave the Shore. Series 3, Episode 7.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: The Great Depression
programme.desc: Ronnie feels like he has no friends left at the Shore after Sammi leaves & the housemates aren't sympathetic to him. Meanwhile, Mike tries to hook up with Pauly's ex-girlfriend! Series 3, Episode 8.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Kissing Cousins
programme.desc: Snooki's summer of hookups comes back to haunt her, and Mike pulls a big prank on Deena & Snooki... but the rest of the guys have the last laugh, leaving for dinner without him. Series 3, Episode 9.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Hunt for Mr. Wright
programme.desc: A report on George Wright, who was sentenced to prison for the 1962 murder of New Jersey service station owner Walter Patterson, and who after spending 8 years in prison, escaped, and spent 40 years on the run from the authorities.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: A report about a desolate strip of land between Houston and Galveston where over 30 young women and girls have disappeared or have been murdered.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A report on the hunt for a serial killer suspected of murdering three young women from Los Angeles, California to Chicago, Illinois.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Accused
programme.desc: A report that focuses on cases where people accused of sexually abusing children were tried and imprisoned based on little real evidence other than the testimony of young children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Accused

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.
